column34: Please let us know where you heard about us?

column10: Cars going EB on Langston Blvd go downhill, often too fast, and tend to run the red light at Langston Blvd and N Nash Stat the bottom of the hill. On this particular day, I was crossing Langston Blvd on N Nash St and once I got the green light, noticed a car traveling EB on Langston Blvd that did not seem like they were going to stop for their red light, which had been red for several seconds. I waited and watched them run through the red light, and proceeded once they cleared the intersection.
column21: Additional signage or slower speed limit on EB Langston Blvd from N Quinn St to N Nash St could alert drivers to the stoplight that is coming up
